title: VISA 401B Advanced Open Studio - ADV OPEN STUDIO
description: Research-based studio with thematic or disciplinary focus.  Intended for senior Visual Art undergraduate students.
prerequisites: Three of VISA 310, VISA 311, VISA 320, VISA 321, VISA 330, VISA 331, VISA 340, VISA 341, VISA 350, VISA 351, VISA 360, VISA 361, VISA 370, VISA 390.
